data.title: Vowels in each word
data.statement: You are required to write a program that finds the number of vowels in each word of a sentence.

data.inputDescription:
A single line, consisting of at least a word.

 - Each word is seperated by a single space.
 - The sentence may consist of alphabets, numbers and/or special characters. Specifically, it may contain any character in the range of characters having ASCII value 33 to 126 inclusive (See the ASCII table).
data.outputDescription:
Output the number of vowels in each word of the inputted sentence, seperated by a single space.

List of vowels your program needs to consider:
A
E
I
O
U
a
e
i
o
u

lastVersion.statementHTML:
The program:
You are required to write a program that finds the number of vowels in each word of a sentence.
INPUT:
A single line, consisting of at least a word.

- Each word is seperated by a single space.
- The sentence may consist of alphabets, numbers and/or special characters. Specifically, it may contain any character in the range of characters having ASCII value 33 to 126 inclusive (See the ASCII table).

OUTPUT:
Output the number of vowels in each word of the inputted sentence, seperated by a single space.

List of vowels your program needs to consider:
A
E
I
O
U
a
e
i
o
u

CONSTRAINTS:
1 ≤ Length of the sentence < 1024

EXAMPLE:
Input
CodinGame
Output
4
